website_summaries.verdict: With a wooden knife block, 14 pieces, and a knife sharpener, this is a comprehensive set that looks great in any kitchen.
pros: The timeless stainless steel look of these knives makes them a safe pick for any home
The blades are fully forged stainless steel and have a pleasant weight and balance
cons: Some found the knife-slot labels on the block a bit tacky
Blades may show rust after several months

customer_reviews.title: Great knives at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to order this set because of the price. I thought that they would be junk because they were so inexpensive. I was SO WRONG. I’m thankful I read the reviews and decided to purchase. They are sharp, a great weight, and aesthetically pleasing. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Parks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing compliment knife set
customer_reviews.text: Amazing compliment to my kitchen. Was the perfect gift to my new apartment, and this should last a nice long time, great quality and SO FAST! good purchase for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: YIMING Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great knives!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set about a month ago and they have impressed me and my family. They are razor sharp and the steak knives are great. We have two families living under one roof and the kitchen gets a lot of traffic, I dont forsee these knives letting up any time soon. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Feltgull03

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!!
customer_reviews.text: They are very sharp! I hope they stay that way. I wash the knives by hand and dry them right away as the instructions say to do. I bought this knife set for my husband for Christmas. He likes it very much. So far so good. I hope the knives stay sharp. Nice product at a very good price and these knives will work nicely with any set of flatware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best knife set I have ever perchased... Very durable!!! Very Balanced. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J Elm Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knife set, which has good quality and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Just awful
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is beautiful if you don't look at it too closely. Then, when you go to cut some food with them you realize that they just stink. The steak knives don't cut; they shred their way through the meat. The scissors are inferior to dollar store scissors--they quite literally are unable to open a paper-thin plastic bag. The finish on the knife blades shows tool marks and milling patterns from the manufacturing process, no polishing at all. I regret buying this. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just love it. Looks rich and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great Knife set for value. It looks stylist and very sharp. Great set for kitchen. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: resh

customer_reviews.title: Best knife set I’ve ever owned! Take my money please!
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife set! Sharpest knives I’ve ever owned. We hand wash the to avoid water spots or rust. I love how they are one single piece of metal so there’s no chance of bacteria getting down into the handle. My husband and I are always joking about how careful we have to be with these because we literally cut ourselves almost every time we use them! They are SHARP! Take my advice, don’t try to grab a blade if it’s starting to fall off the counter! Oops!
customer_reviews.author: Micah Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later, still amazing
customer_reviews.text: Incredible knives. Have had them for a year now and they are still spotless and look brand new. Incredible durability and quality
customer_reviews.author: Mario Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My set came without 4 of the steak knives.. This is horrible because the set is so beautiful. But looks tacky without the other knives.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: The knives are fantastic. Sharp. Great craftsmanship. Balanced. All 1 piece construction. To sum it in one word... Incredable!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A. Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I never really do reviews but this felt important as I saw these had 4.5 stars but a lot of reviews seem very outdated. I washed by hand and dried and they still rusted like within the 2nd month I had them. I sharpen them as instructed and they are never sharp enough. Giving up and buying a new set. I wish I would have returned within my window but it was too late by the time I realized how bad they were.
customer_reviews.author: #truthbomb

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the high quality of te knives and variety of the pieces. They ar attractive and pretty well-built. Everyting fits perfectly in the wood block and it makes a handsome piece on the countertop of my contemporary kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Joslin Chen

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again- but I won’t need to anytime soon.
customer_reviews.text: We love this knife set. It is classy and durable. It looks really nice on our counter and it is high quality. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lietzke

customer_reviews.title: Sharp beautiful, quality at a good price set of knives.
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives. Finally shelled out a little bit more for a decent set and I am quite pleased with how well they work and aesthetically pleasing to the eye they are. They are definitely sharp as a knife should be. The wood block is solid and beautiful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rayden

customer_reviews.title: Missing my scissors
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful knife set but I'm missing my scissors. I'm disappointed but honestly, they couldn't have been better than the scissors I already use for meat so it's all good. I just wish all the pieces had been included so it didn't have to mess up the look of the block with an empty slot.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W. Bridgeman

customer_reviews.title: beautiful knives
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knives, excellent quality, however, they are not self sharpening, the block does not have the built in sharpener. The set contains a manual sharpening tool.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Nieves

customer_reviews.title: good brightness and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: this knife set looks nice. It is made of high quality stainless steel and is equipped with a solid wooden knife holder.This high quality stainless steel knife set is fully loaded and all the tools can be safely and easily stored in the wooden holder. This knife set is well equipped to meet all your basic needs.This tool has a smooth appearance, good brightness and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp knives. They are great other than the fact that they rusted after 2 months of normal use. I don’t have a dishwasher so only hand washing was done.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah fleming

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spend the money
customer_reviews.text: Sharp for about a month then start going full. They also rust very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Leasure

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé for Christmas. It came perfect, other than maybe a small black mark under the hobo logo but I don’t mind it. I haven’t washed them but I will more than likely hand wash. I Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy- the knives are very dull and have been since day 1
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy- the knives are very dull and have been since day 1. Should have sent them back, but too late now. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knife Block had worn sides
customer_reviews.text: Sides of the block were worn and scratched. Returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: maggie l

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great for the home chef. They look great and both the knives and the wood block are of very good quality. They come individually wrapped with a plastic bag, a plastic shell and a plastic cover for the point per knife. I cant wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mma

customer_reviews.title: An impressive gift
customer_reviews.text: These knives are beautiful and sharp, and made for one excited recipient! I usually like to keep counters clear but this is so nice-looking that having it on display all the time doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: KLSC

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality of knives!
customer_reviews.text: This product I’m not satisfied with, all the knives have rust on them after going through the dishwasher for the first time!! The knives also have pitting, gouges in the blades and handles!,they are not solid stainless steel only dipped!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Best knife set and low cost
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this set as a gift however ended up keeping and I'm glad I did, super nice design and I use the steak knifes regularly just throw on the dishwasher and it's shine and nice again.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro K

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I hand wash them, which is what you should be doing with nice knives. They’ve helped up well and they’re super sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered quick and very nicely wrapped. They are made out of great quality materials. Compared to others that are super expensive.,I know I made a good purchase at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas.... She LOVES them! Said the best knives she's owned! Thinking I'll buy some for myself! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: Other then, having to sharpen all of them, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing for the price! These knifes have a nice weight to them. Believe me when I say they are SHARP! and keeping them in the wood block will help maintain the sharpness!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T

customer_reviews.title: They come sharp and stay sharp
customer_reviews.text: Good value still sharp after 2mths almost and zero rust
customer_reviews.author: Frank ferrante

customer_reviews.title: Partially satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The knives themselves are great but the block they sit in is damaged. Despite being carefully packaged and the outer boxes being fully intact, the wooden block has chips and scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year or two
customer_reviews.text: If the outer layer scratches off, rust will set in. These will probably last two years and then you will need a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product is poor quality— product rust within an hour of being wet and it wast even sitting in water—just rinsed off— the handles get slippy while using them to cut up meat- serious safety flaw—
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great produc
customer_reviews.text: I love the knife set. Doesn't take up much space and works well with my granite
customer_reviews.author: Jlh

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was nice and everything looked clean and sharp. It has a sturdy wooden base. I have it as a gift to my parents. So far they enjoy the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Have used this knife set now for just over 5 months. They are used everyday and are as sharp today as the day we received them. Very elegant and clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: good for family and cheap
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my mom。she told this knife set is very good for her to cut veg and meat。she very love it and it good prices to buy
customer_reviews.author: james curry

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp. The bolt pin hole rusted on the sides on all of them when washed. Other than no complaints. I’ve cut myself several times with them in The sink.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knife set because the knife sets are Made of food grade high quality stainless steel, well resisted against corrosion and oxidation, safe, durable, easy to sharpen and maintain its shininess. Sturdy wooden holder holds the knives tidy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like handle
customer_reviews.text: This knife set are well, but I don’t these handle of knife, when my hand is wet, the handle is smooth,that will be so dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Zonas

customer_reviews.title: Great knives!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are balanced and sharp and look great on my counter!😊
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rorie-Baety

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS TRASH!!
customer_reviews.text: After owning these knives for a month, they started showing rust spots. I stopped using them so I don’t get rust in my food. They do not allow returns and do not stand behind their products. Overpriced trash.
customer_reviews.author: mitcster1

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful set . Although the steak knife shred the meat instead of actually cutting it. The scissors work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set LOOKS great ... but is a let down
customer_reviews.text: Knives begain to rust in dishwasher in less than 2 months! Very dull after just a few uses as well. Set LOOKS great ... but is a let down
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Rusting and dull
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in February used only a couple times because they aren’t very sharp/don’t work well and they are already rusting. Wish I had returned :(
customer_reviews.author: Erika Samarron

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Product is good quality and heavy duty. They are so sharp I’m nearly afraid to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality and great price! Very durable and wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good and sharp knives. They are great quality but if you don’t dry them properly they will rust.
customer_reviews.author: cuitlahuac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set !
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my mom for Christmas and she loved them. Defiantly a great gift ! And who didn’t need some super sharp knives in their kitchen ! Excellent gift for someone who loved to cook
customer_reviews.author: Génesis Canales

customer_reviews.title: nice gift for my mom
customer_reviews.text: I brought this knife set for my mom as a Christmas gift.She really love it.She enjoys preparing the food with this useful knife set.She said she could cut every different food with a suitable knife from this knife set.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are amazing! I was looking at similar ones at Macy’s that were triple the price. They’re so sharp and they look sleek and exspensive. Everyone complements me on them!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: These knives are amazing and I would definitely recommend buying them. My husband loves them and we use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A gift worth giving
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our daughter & her husband . It went to their cabin .It's a really high -end set and It does look really expensive . The knives cut , chop, slice beautifully . They were very happy with them .
customer_reviews.author: Mary Manigle

customer_reviews.title: Works great looks good on counter
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my boyfriend..he loves it I do also.. arrived on time nice packaging...its great would buy again
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great feel,  great edge,  great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love them, my best set to date. Overall they have a great edge, i love the one piece design so no crevices to collect debris. And they feel really nice in the hand. My only improvement i would add would be an included fillet knife. So far, i would highly suggest this set for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mahala Horn

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: This knife set surpassed my expectations. It’s beautifully made, very sharp and stylish. I would order another if I had need for more!! They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: shelleann grant

customer_reviews.title: Looks sleek, not very sharp though
customer_reviews.text: The look and design is great, but I was disappointed in the lack of sharpness of the knives, particularly the big chef's knife. Good thing I have a knife sharpener, or I would have returned the set. Cant beat the price though. I guess you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I have had these knives for a week now and I really like them. They are very high quality knives. They also aren't too expensive which is always a plus. I would recommend this knife set to anyone looking for a good set of knives without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: jessgee

customer_reviews.title: They are sharp
customer_reviews.text: These knifes are great, very sharp and very nice block to hold them in, plus very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these knifes! They’re sharp and with all of the cooking I do, they don’t seem to really get dull fast. Overall I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knives
customer_reviews.text: We rented a beach house stocked with HOBO knives. The ease of use sparked our interest to buy for CB our own home.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The knife set is great! I was unsure at first but the set includes everything and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Myers

customer_reviews.title: Quality in the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: My roomie is a gourmet cook and she loves these knives. I like the quality and style that lends panache to my kitchen! Good buy !
customer_reviews.author: Debo

customer_reviews.title: comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: Warm heart standard, complete equipment, such a set of knives, you don’t have to worry about cutting vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great Set Until It Starts to Rust :(
customer_reviews.text: I really do not recommend this set and am confused how it has such high ratings. I purchased this back in February and 3 months later it is beginning to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Mo

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son..he likes the set very much.A little disappointed it is not good to put in dishwasher...
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic, with a great edge!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kitchen knife set. Do not put in dishwasher and they will last. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Imbrogno

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are exactly what I wanted. You can cut chicken like butter!!! Buy these
customer_reviews.author: Angel Fross

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, very sharp knives and good looking too
customer_reviews.author: Shawn McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. Get what you pay for. Have to wash and dry immediately after using. Left it in the sink for a couple of hours rinsed off and there is no a rust spot.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wow - Great Set of Knives
customer_reviews.text: I do not like wood handles and this provides just what I want.
customer_reviews.author: William T Saffold

customer_reviews.title: MISSING SCISSORS!
customer_reviews.text: My scissors weren't included and no one seems to be able to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good knives
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and very handy. I like the design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andreea Bujor

customer_reviews.title: Purchase me as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift so I can’t conment on the function but they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Long

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are very sturdy and just the right weight. Extremely nice.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary Knowles

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t like the rust it gets so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife set with quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: This set was purchased as a gift. It arrived very quickly and looked to be very nice
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for a knife set
customer_reviews.text: Best knife set I have bought very shape and stay sharpe. Had them for a year now
customer_reviews.author: Joshua kent

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality knife set.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of knives not to heavy, but have some weight to them as well. Just hand wash them is what I do no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: R Anderson

customer_reviews.title: going dull after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents for Christmas 2018 and now, less than a year later some of the knives have become dull and some also show small spots of rust. The rust isn't very noticeable, but the knives going dull and just pushing into a tomato instead of slicing through it, or avocados, etc. isn't really what I was hoping for. Don't regret the purchase because they've very pretty, but what is the time period before considering a dull knife to be... not great?
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Cuts food like butter
customer_reviews.text: Chef and paring knife work beautifully. Haven't tried the other knives out yet, but am hopeful that all will be just as sharp. Easy to clean, and are dried and replaced into block immediately after use. (Steak knives- I have placed in the block with their blades facing up, so that they will not scrape the wood slots and dull blades.) Very hopeful with this beautiful set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: THESE KNIVES RUST VERY QUICKLY
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly not high quality stainless steel. I have had these knives for only one month, and they are already rusting....Do NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Solange

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are amazing. My previous set was gifted to me when I was married 10 years ago and several knives had broken and it never was a great set. I started looking and came across this set. The base is very solid and nice looking. I love that the entire knife is one continuous piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I really like these.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set. I am a fan of Rada knives and didn't think these would compare, but they are just as good or even better. The knives are easy to hold and well shaped for kitchen use. They came already very sharp. Good price. A good basic kitchen knife set
customer_reviews.author: HighMileageFeets

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These knives are lightweight and sharp, which I really like. I didn't even mind washing them by hand. But within the first week I discovered a small chip on one of the handles. I left feedback, but never heard back. A second knife now has a chip in the handle. These knives have only been only hand washed and never dropped. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of knives. We just wish the HOBO logo wasn't so large on the front of it. It's huge in big black print.
customer_reviews.author: nancyntenn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is gorgeous on my countertop. The knives are beautiful and shiny and very sharp. The block is heavy and sturdy. I have hand washed as directed, and they are still great-have not had them very long though
customer_reviews.author: jenfuks

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Love the knives love hole set !! There more than what i expected there real sharp out the box and will not cry if the blades get a lil rusty that just means u haven't taken care of them like there supposed to like the instructions say...
customer_reviews.author: Josuesarmiento85

customer_reviews.title: Gift for myself
customer_reviews.text: This set is heavy and well made. I enjoy it and the stainless steel look. The holder that came with it is heavy and well made. I'll have this set for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for weeks. They are good inexpensive knifes. Had no issues with rusting. They are solid. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: RANDY MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this knife set! Knives cut well and sharpen up nice! Not having any problems with rust either! Would recommend purchasing this item!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hoelz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.text: One year review. Great addition to our kitchen. Wish they made a bigger set we use them so much. They keeps good edge and look great still.
customer_reviews.author: Celestino B.

customer_reviews.title: Rust in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: After one wash in the dishwasher, it has rust dots.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Dig it.
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Have had it for a few months and the knives remain sharp. Sharpen the ones routinely that I use more often and they have kept their edge. Hand wash. Great set at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Eureka

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it should cost more for the quality. Excellent knives
customer_reviews.text: Best set I have ever had. Great price and super sharp.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Stays sharp
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly good quality for the money. Still sharp after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Peronto

product_meta.title: HOBO 2019 Kitchen 14-Piece German Professional Chef Knife Set with Wooden Block, Premium Anti-Rust Cutlery Scissors and Sharpener, Silver
feature_bullets: German high quality stainless steel blades for precision and accuracy.
Sharp blade is forged with hand-polished edges and precise tempering.
Ergonomically designed stainless steel handle provides comfort.
Easy to use and care, all knives store safely in the HOBO knife block.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,168 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
